{{champion:432}} *chimes*
I am definitely the second when I play Bard.

> [{quoted}](name=TonyTonyMordecai,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RGuk84V5,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-08-03T17:58:20.071+0000)
>
> I am definitely the second when I play Bard.

I play Teemo support.

Lol I'm the kind of support main that doesn't just want to win lane against the enemy adc/supp, I want to win the psychological war. If I have poke, I make sure to break their spirits with it. If I have sustain, I make sure they know their attempts and existence are meaningless. Shields? Your petty attempts to poke my carry down amuse me. Wards? Hah as soon as I get a control ward and sweepers I'll use it to destroy every notion of safety you hold dear >:). What's this? You're having a bad game, not doing well/feeding? Good. I'LL HARRASS YOU INTO THE GROUND WITH MY RAKA Q'S TILL YOU CRY AND LOSE ALL HOPE! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! Honor me pls :3. Good job team! Thanks for the gank jungle, you're a babe. _none of them know the monster that lies within_
Telling the enemy team in ranked "Sorry about the afk, guys! :(" but not really meaning it because you want that sweet, sweet LP?

> [{quoted}](name=Quort,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RGuk84V5,comment-id=00100001,timestamp=2017-08-04T04:57:22.446+0000)
>
> Telling the enemy team in ranked "Sorry about the afk, guys! :(" but not really meaning it because you want that sweet, sweet LP?

More like punishing whoever's left in lane based on their pick... If they have an afk and their poor ashe or soraka is left alone, I show mercy. If the scumbag who picked Draven or Blitz is left, I try to make them want to afk too. Payback for trying to make me have to deal with that shit in lane.
Don't forget to smile ^^
can confirm
{{champion:21}} Don't worry, my faithful companion. I share your inner thoughts.

Difficult to grasp what this message is.

Seems like...on the left is real supports like Janna and Soraka and on the right is 'supports' like Vel'koz and Veigar.
Did I get that right?

No, supports mains are all nice and friendly and want to crush and destroy the enemy bot lane just as much as the most toxic spew sludging troll out there.  So it's like "Let's have a good game guys! <3" proceeds to literally drive the enemy bot lane insane with their play.
Yup.  Very little feels better than knowing your opponent knows you've beaten them.  You can feel the helplessness and as a support it's a sweet wine of victory.

I fully acknowledge that I will [almost] never receive credit for my actions. 
But when the enemy team rages in /all chat accusing my ADC of scripting, hacking, smurfing etc., I'm always sure to thank them for the complement. XD
What are you guys talking about? Are you saying you just don't play these girls? {{champion:40}} {{champion:16}}
Not that hard to see that he wants to destroy enemy botlane along with everything they love...
This is me whenever i play soraka and make the enemy laners life's a living hell with my Q spam.
This is why I play support. To encourage (without sarcasm) the lane that has gone 7/28/3 against my Caitlyn Blitz combo, and make everyone else feel good while I take down all their towers.

> [{quoted}](name=Hmagamer,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RGuk84V5,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-08-03T15:48:39.652+0000)
>
> http://imgur.com/TLe8mHr

As {{champion:16}} I go estimated 0/2/30 most of the time even then I'm more worried about when to use {{item:3190}} {{item:3222}} {{item:3107}} {{item:3069}} than winning because I'll be blamed for not being a useful healer ~~sloot~~.

You really shouldn't be using Locket on Soraka anymore, tbh. Its shield scales with your level and bonus health. Two things Soraka tends to lack (If you're buying health on Soraka, you're doing it wrong).
Unless you pull off a miracle and get fed enough to buy Warmog's and another health item.

Not even then. Her W costs 10% of her max HP, while her Q, R, and innate regen give a flat number. You end up spending more health for recovering the same amount on both you and your ally, unless your health item is Spirit Visage.

And at that point you're losing efficiency on your heals, because now you're not buying items to increase healing.

I always make life a living hell with my SUPPORT SINGED dealing constant damage and zoning them away from their farm. Exhausting and slowing their adc so their basically stunned and my adc or jungler pick up free kills. Flipping the extremely squishy critical health Adc running from a team fight into my poison trail and dancing on their soon to be corpse. 

I have a VIP reserved place in hell now. 

Satan: " Let's see here who's next ah AA there you are"  * moves velvet rope 
AA " Why thank you Satan " 
Satan : " Anytime and enjoy your stay at our new area the tenth circle of hell"

*Cough*
